also i give this piece of garbage a bad rewiev because its full of cheaters and it still has 64 tick rate and over all the only thing developers think about is how to make even more money out of this game , even pro players use cheats and the whole pro scene was a big joke because of the coach bug and they had waited 3 years to fix it , so screw this game , screw life and screw you whoever is reading this and found it helpfull.
